title: OxygenOS Open Beta 1 w/ Android 12 now available for OnePlus Nord
content:
The first-generation OnePlus Nord is now finally starting to see Android 12, but, at least for now, it’s in the form of OxygenOS Open Beta 1.

more…

The post OxygenOS Open Beta 1 w/ Android 12 now available for OnePlus Nord appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The first-generation OnePlus Nord is now finally starting to see Android 12, but, at least for now, it’s in the form of OxygenOS Open Beta 1.
